resources.string: A technological evalu<font color="#B388FF">action</font> of contemporary experiences in museums.
Share your evalu<font color="#B388FF">action</font> with your friends.
Press the center button to start the roulette, when finished press again to continue
Make a grimace: How is the ugliest face the more points you'll give to the evalu<font color="#B388FF">action</font>. Press the button of the camera to take the picture.
Evaluate aesthetic, reflective and interactive sample proposals
Evaluate the development of the actions and conduct by the educator
Evaluate the choice and distribution of the works in the exhibition space
Evaluate another aspect not covered by the other options
Make a grimace to make your evaluaction. How is the ugliest face, the more points you'll give
Applauds to make your evaluaction. How strong are your applause, more score you'll give
Shout for your evaluaction. How strong are you scream, the more points you'll give
Jump to make your evaluaction. The higher is your jump, the more points you'll give
Smile for your evaluaction. How much bigger is your smile, more score you'll give
Kiss to make your evaluaction. The stronger sound your kiss, the more points you'll give
